text: Robert Livermore (October 16, 1909 - February 12, 1991) was an American alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. He graduated from Harvard University. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1991 deaths Category:American male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of the United States Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Boston Category:Harvard College alumni
title: Robert Livermore (alpine skier)
